inclusion.criterion: survivor of breast, prostate, lung, colorectal, cervical or oral cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: live within the Baltimore Maryland area
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: finished active cancer treatment at least three months ago
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: overweight or obese and do not exercise daily
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no physical limitation to do mild to moderate physical activities
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: has a smart phone with Wi-Fi internet connection at home
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to accept random study assignment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to wear a Fitbit band for five weeks every single day
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to have an Echo speaker installed in your home and use the digital voice assist for four weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to receive daily text messages on your phone for four weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to provide access to your Fitbit physical activities data
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: already doing moderate to high physical activities in their daily life
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: planning to relocate within the next 4-5 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of frequent alcohol consumption. She has leukocytosis, urea elevation, high CRP, high amylase, and glucose level of 15. Her abdominal CT scan revealed acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis with enlarged common bile duct and intrahepatic duct confirming gall stone pancreatitis.
